proposal: Diving into the world of ZK technology, zkInfra is redefining privacy and efficiency in DeFi and AI. 🕵️‍♂️ With 327 holders on the ETH network, congrats! Imagine combining your cutting-edge privacy with our B2B tools like DEX creation or a blockchain-based lottery. Together, we can offer the community not just privacy, but also prosperity. Let's build a more private and profitable ecosystem.
